curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"direction":"in", "is_test":true, "metadata":"weee", "fax":{"id":7, "status":"OK","direction":"receive","cost":7,"requested_at":"2015-07-13 22:53.33","is_test":true, "from_number":"+27218801880"}}' http://ec2-52-25-21-125.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8000/api/fax2me/
